Package com.authenticket.authenticket.controller

Class TicketController

java.lang.Object
com.authenticket.authenticket.service.Utility
com.authenticket.authenticket.controller.TicketController
@RestController @CrossOrigin(origins={"${authenticket.frontend-production-url}","${authenticket.frontend-dev-url}","${authenticket.loadbalancer-url}"}, methods={GET,POST,PUT,DELETE}, allowedHeaders={"Authorization","Cache-Control","Content-Type"}, allowCredentials="true") @RequestMapping("/api/v2/ticket") public class TicketController extends Utility
This is the ticket controller class and the base path for this controller's endpoint is api/v2/ticket.

    • findAllTicket

      @GetMapping public List<TicketDisplayDto> findAllTicket()
      Retrieve a list of all tickets in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of ticket information as `TicketDisplayDto`.

    • findTicketById

      @GetMapping("/{ticketId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GeneralApiResponse<Object>> findTicketById(@PathVariable("ticketId") Integer ticketId)
      Retrieve a list of all tickets in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of ticket information as `TicketDisplayDto`.

    • allocateSeats

      @PostMapping("/allocate-seats") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GeneralApiResponse<Object>> allocateSeats(@RequestParam("eventId") Integer eventId, @RequestParam("sectionId") String sectionId, @RequestParam("ticketsToPurchase") Integer ticketsToPurchase)
      Allocate seats for an event within a specific section.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event for seat allocation.
      sectionId - The ID of the section for seat allocation.
      ticketsToPurchase - The number of tickets to allocate.
      Returns:
      A response indicating the successful allocation of seats.

    • saveTicket

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GeneralApiResponse<Object>> saveTicket(@RequestParam("eventId") Integer eventId, @RequestParam("categoryId") Integer categoryId, @RequestParam("sectionId") String sectionId, @RequestParam("rowNo") Integer rowNo, @RequestParam("seatNo") Integer seatNo, @RequestParam(value="ticketHolder",required=false) String ticketHolder, @RequestParam(value="orderId",required=false) Integer orderId)
      Save a new ticket with optional details.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event for the ticket.
      categoryId - The ID of the ticket category.
      sectionId - The ID of the section for the ticket.
      rowNo - The row number for the ticket (optional).
      seatNo - The seat number for the ticket (optional).
      ticketHolder - The name of the ticket holder (optional).
      orderId - The ID of the order associated with the ticket (optional).
      Returns:
      A response indicating the successful creation of the ticket.
